chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Representable: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
RepresentableAlternate: forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B
RepresentableHelp: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
Representable_ext: forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A
succFormula: Formula
zeroFormula: Formula
projFormula: nat -> Formula
composeSigmaFormula: forall n : nat, nat -> forall m : nat, Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n)%type m -> Formula -> Formula
minimize: Formula -> Formula -> nat -> nat -> Formula
primRecSigmaFormulaHelp: nat -> Formula -> Formula -> Formula
primRecPiFormulaHelp: nat -> Formula -> Formula -> Formula
primRecSigmaFormula: nat -> Formula -> Formula -> Formula

Goal:
forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN betaFormula) -> In v (freeVarTerm LNN (var 1)) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (var 2)) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (var 0))

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope

var = fol.var LNN : nat -> fol.Term LNN Arguments var _%nat_scope
betaFormula = existH 3 (andH (LT (var 3) (Succ (var 2))) (existH 4 (andH (LT (var 4) (Succ (var 2))) (andH (equal (Plus (Times (Plus (var 3) (var 4)) (Succ (Plus (var 3) (var 4)))) (Times (natToTerm 2) (var 3))) (Times (natToTerm 2) (var 2))) (andH (LT (var 0) (Succ (Times (var 3) (Succ (var 1))))) (existH 5 (andH (LT (var 5) (Succ (var 4))) (equal (Plus (var 0) (Times (var 5) (S
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> list nat
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensembles.Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
iffH = fol.iffH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula ->...-> Formula |- Type]
composeSigmaRepresentable : forall n w m : nat, n <= w -> forall (A : Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) m) (B : Formula) (g : naryFunc m), RepresentablesHelp n m A -> Vector.t_rect (Formula * naryFunc n) (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) n0) => Prop) True (fun (pair : Formula * naryFunc n) (m0 : nat) (_ : Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) m0) (rec : Prop) => (forall v0 : nat, In v0 (freeVarFormula LNN (fst pair)) -> v0 <= n) /\ rec) m A -> Representable m g B -> Representable n (evalComposeFunc n m (FormulasToFuncs n m A) g) (composeSigmaFormula n w m A B)
expressible.RepresentableAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f B
expressible.Representable_ext : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n g A
minimize1 : forall (A B : Formula) (v x : nat), v <> x -> ~ In x (freeVarFormula LNN B) -> forall a : nat, SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN A v (natToTerm a)) -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN B v (natToTerm a)) -> (forall b : nat, b < a -> SysPrf NN (notH (substituteFormula LNN A v (natToTerm b)))) -> (forall b : nat, b < a -> SysPrf NN (notH (substituteFormula LNN B v (natToTerm b)))) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (minimize A B v x) (equal (var v) (natToTerm a)))
FormulasToFormula : forall n : nat, nat -> forall m : nat, Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) m -> Formula
RepresentableHalfHelp : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), RepresentableHalf1 T n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A
subAddExistsNice : forall (n m : nat) (A : Formula) (v : nat) (s : Term), n + m <= v \/ v < m -> (forall v0 : nat, In v0 (freeVarTerm LNN s) -> n + m <= v0 \/ v0 < m) -> substituteFormula LNN (addExists m n A) v s = addExists m n (substituteFormula LNN A v s)
subFormulaMinimize : forall (A B : Formula) (v x z : nat) (s : Term), ~ In x (freeVarTerm LNN s) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm LNN s) -> x <> z -> v <> z -> SysPrf NN (iffH (substituteFormula LNN (minimize A B v x) z s) (minimize (substituteFormula LNN A z s) (substituteFormula LNN B z s) v x))
freeVarPrimRecSigmaFormulaHelp1 : forall (n : nat) (A B : Formula) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (primRecSigmaFormulaHelp n A B)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN A) \/ In v (freeVarFormula LNN B) \/ v = S (S n) \/ v = S n
freeVarPrimRecPiFormulaHelp1 : forall (n : nat) (A B : Formula) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (primRecPiFormulaHelp n A B)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN A) \/ In v (freeVarFormula LNN B) \/ v = S (S n) \/ v = S n
expressible.RepresentableHelp : System -> forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
In_betaFormula_subst_1 : forall (a : Term) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN betaFormula 1 a)) -> In v (freeVarTerm LNN a) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (var 2)) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (var 0))
reduceAddExists : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))
reduceAddForalls : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (addForalls m n A) (addForalls m n B))
freeVarSubAllTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms L n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a))
freeVarSubAllFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula L f m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
freeVarAddExists2 : forall (n m v : nat) (A : Formula), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (addExists m n A)) -> n + m <= v \/ v < m
reduceAddExistsOneWay : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (impH A B) -> SysPrf NN (impH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))
expressibleAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> ExpressibleHelp T n R A -> ExpressibleHelp T n R B
In_betaFormula_subst_1_2 : forall (a b : Term) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN betaFormula 1 a) 2 b)) -> In v (freeVarTerm LNN a) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN b) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (var 0))
freeVarAddExists1 : forall (n m v : nat) (A : Formula), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (addExists m n A)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN A)
addForalls = fix addForalls (m n : nat) (f : Formula) {struct n} : Formula := match n with | 0 => f | S n' => forallH (n' + m) (addForalls m n' f) end : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments addForalls (_ _)%nat_scope
addExists = fix addExists (m n : nat) (f : Formula) {struct n} : Formula := match n with | 0 => f | S n' => existH (n' + m) (addExists m n' f) end : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments addExists (_ _)%nat_scope
boundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf NN (impH (LT (var x) (natToTerm m)) a)
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm L t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))

RepresentableHalf2 : System -> forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
expressible.Representable : System -> forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
Representable2Expressible : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> SysPrf T (notH (equal (natToTerm 1) (natToTerm 0))) -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A : Formula), expressible.Representable T n (charFunction n R) A -> Expressible T n R (substituteFormula LNN A 0 (natToTerm 1))
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
In_betaFormula_subst_1_2_0 : forall (a b c : Term) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN betaFormula 1 a) 2 b) 0 c)) -> In v (freeVarTerm LNN a) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN b) \/ In v (freeVarTerm LNN c)
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Type), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.t_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Set), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
extEqualCompose : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (f1 f2 : naryFunc m), extEqualVector n m l1 l2 -> extEqual m f1 f2 -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n m l1 f1) (evalComposeFunc n m l2 f2)
FormulasToFuncs : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
RepresentablesHelp : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) m -> Prop
evalComposeFunc : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> naryFunc m -> naryFunc n
